statements: SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM website_traffic WHERE page_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM website_traffic;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM website_traffic GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE activity_type LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT timestamp, activity_type FROM website_traffic WHERE page_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, user_id, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM website_traffic GROUP BY user_id HAVING visit_count > 5
SELECT user_id, page_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM website_traffic GROUP BY user_id, page_id ORDER BY activity_count DESC
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity_time FROM website_traffic
SELECT * FROM website_traffic ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 123 AND engagement_score > 0.5;
SELECT DISTINCT page_id FROM website_traffic;
SELECT page_id, ad_id, advertiser_id FROM ad_placements WHERE advertiser_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, page_id, engagement_score FROM website_traffic WHERE page_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, page_id FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM ad_placements WHERE advertiser_id = 500 ORDER BY page_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM website_traffic WHERE page_id = 200 AND engagement_score > 0.5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement FROM website_traffic GROUP BY page_id;
SELECT ad_id, advertiser_id FROM ad_placements JOIN website_traffic ON ad_placements.page_id = website_traffic.page_id WHERE website_traffic.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ad_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic;
SELECT id, page_url, visit_date FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT ad_name, page_location, cost_per_click FROM ad_placements WHERE cost_per_click > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE visit_date = '2022-01-15' AND page_url LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM website_traffic;
SELECT id, page_url, visit_date FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, cost_per_click FROM ad_placements WHERE page_location = 'sidebar' ORDER BY cost_per_click ASC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, total_visits FROM user_engagement WHERE total_visits > 50;

SELECT user_engagement.user_id, user_engagement.engagement_score, user_engagement.last_login, website_traffic.page_url FROM user_engagement LEFT JOIN website_traffic ON user_engagement.user_id = website_traffic.user_id;
SELECT * FROM website_visits ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, duration_in_seconds FROM website_visits WHERE user_id = 123 AND duration_in_seconds > 30;
SELECT ad_id, placement_name, cost_per_impression FROM ad_placements WHERE impressions_count >= 1000 ORDER BY cost_per_impression ASC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_duration_seconds, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY engagement_duration_seconds DESC;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, click_timestamp FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_location = 'HomePage' ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM website_visits ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM website_visits GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT page_visited, SUM(duration_in_seconds) FROM website_visits GROUP BY page_visited;
SELECT ad_id, placement_name, ad_type FROM ad_placements WHERE cost_per_impression > 1.00;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement JOIN ad_clicks ON user_engagement.user_id = ad_clicks.user_id ORDER BY engagement_duration_seconds DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_visits ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT page_location, impressions FROM ad_placements WHERE placement_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT * FROM ad_revenue WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM website_visits ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id HAVING SUM(clicks) > 100;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, DATE(engagement_timestamp) AS date FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM ad_revenue WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY ad_id HAVING SUM(revenue_amount) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM ad_placements WHERE page_location LIKE '%sidebar%' ORDER BY placement_timestamp ASC;
